# AssetMark

## Overview

| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Website** | [assetmark.com](https://www.assetmark.com/) |
| **Category** | Wealth Management Platform / Investment Management / TAMP (Turnkey Asset Management Program) |
| **Description** | AssetMark is a leading provider of extensive wealth management and technology solutions that help financial advisors meet the ever-changing needs of their clients and businesses. The platform offers comprehensive investment management, portfolio construction, client communication, and practice management support through their eWealthManager advisor portal and integrated technology stack. AssetMark serves as a turnkey asset management program (TAMP) with open-architecture design, providing advanced investment selection, modeling, and portfolio analytics. |

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Name | Cost | Key Features |
|------|------|------|--------------|
| **Starter** | GuideMark Funds | **0.45% - 0.57% advisory rates** | Model portfolios, basic advisory services, client reporting |
| **Standard** | GuidePath Funds | **0.25% - 1.05% advisory rates** | Advanced portfolio strategies, customization options |
| **Platform Fee** | eWealthManager | **$350 annual minimum** (waived on American Funds/Multiple Strategy) | Portal access, reporting, client management tools |
| **Direct Indexing** | Custom Portfolios | **0.50%+ minimum** ($75k minimum) | Direct indexing with tax management, customization |

**Notes on Pricing:**
- **Platform Fee:** $350 annual minimum (waived on American Funds and Multiple Strategy Accounts)
- **Transaction Fees:** $20 per trade for transaction-based fees
- **Direct Indexing:** Starts at 0.50% with Tax Management Services (TMS) included, $75k minimum
- **Advisor Managed Portfolios:** Flat fee 0.25% - 0.29% with $10,000 account minimum
- **Savos Dynamic Hedging Fund:** 1.20% advisory rate
- **Savos Fees:** AssetMark only retains a portion of advisory fees
- **Custodial Sweep:** Selected by AssetMark at no additional cost

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **Portfolio Management** - Advanced investment selection and modeling
- **Performance Reporting** - Comprehensive reporting and analytics
- **Fee Billing** - Automated advisory fee calculation and billing
- **Client Communication** - Tools for client engagement and communication
- **Practice Management** - Business development and operational support

### Advanced Features
- **Open-Architecture Design** - Flexible investment selection across multiple asset classes
- **Portfolio Analytics** - Advanced analytics and risk assessment tools
- **Direct Indexing** - Custom direct indexing with tax management
- **Model Portfolios** - Professionally managed model portfolios
- **Client Portal** - eWealthManager advisor portal for client management

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **Custom Portfolio Construction** - Bespoke portfolio solutions
- **White-Label Options** - Platform branding for larger institutions
- **Advanced API Access** - Custom integration capabilities
- **Dedicated Support** - Enterprise-level customer success
- **Practice Management Consulting** - Business growth support

---

## Add-On Products & Services

### eWealthManager Platform
**What it does:** Comprehensive advisor portal for client management and account administration

**Key Features:**
- Client account management
- Portfolio monitoring and analytics
- Reporting and document management
- Practice management tools
- Integrated CRM capabilities

**Pricing:** $350 annual platform fee (waived on certain accounts)

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors seeking unified client management
- Practices needing operational efficiency
- Firms wanting integrated reporting

### Direct Indexing
**What it does:** Custom direct indexing with tax management services

**Key Features:**
- Start at 0.50% advisory rate
- Tax loss harvesting included
- $75,000 minimum investment
- Custom investment models
- Professional portfolio management

**Pricing:** 0.50%+ annual advisory fee

**Use Cases:**
- Tax-conscious investors
- High-net-worth clients
- Practices seeking tax-efficient solutions

### GuideMark & GuidePath Funds
**What it does:** Professionally managed model portfolios

**Key Features:**
- Multiple investment strategies
- Various risk profiles
- Professional management
- Regular rebalancing
- Comprehensive reporting

**Pricing:** 0.45% - 1.05% advisory rates

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors seeking model portfolio solutions
- Practices wanting professional management
- Firms requiring diversified investment options

---

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** 20+ platforms across multiple categories

**Integration Types:**
- Native integrations (direct API connections)
- Third-party platform connections
- Data aggregation capabilities
- CRM synchronization

**Key Integration Categories:**
- CRM Systems
- Financial Planning Software
- Custodian Platforms
- Portfolio Management Tools
- Communication Platforms

### Key Integrations

#### 1. Redtail CRM Integration
**Type:** Native integration (bi-directional)  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Seamless data sync between AssetMark and Redtail CRM  
**Data Synced:** Client accounts, balances, holdings, demographics, contact information  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (pre-configured integration)  
**Limitations:** Requires Redtail CRM subscription  
**Documentation:** Available through AssetMark and Redtail

#### 2. Voyant Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export to financial planning)  
**What it does:** Integrates with Voyant for comprehensive financial planning workflows  
**Data Synced:** Portfolio data, account information, client profiles  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires Voyant subscription)  
**Limitations:** Separate platform required  
**Documentation:** Available through Voyant

#### 3. MoneyGuide Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export to financial planning)  
**What it does:** Integrates with MoneyGuide for financial planning capabilities  
**Data Synced:** Portfolio data, account information, client profiles  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires MoneyGuide subscription)  
**Limitations:** Separate platform required  
**Documentation:** Available through MoneyGuide

#### 4. eWealthManager Portal
**Type:** Native platform  
**Direction:** Bi-directional (internal platform)  
**What it does:** Comprehensive advisor portal for client management  
**Data Synced:** All account and client data within AssetMark ecosystem  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (native platform access)  
**Limitations:** AssetMark ecosystem only  
**Documentation:** Available through AssetMark

#### 5. Wealthbox Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data sync to Wealthbox)  
**What it does:** Connects client accounts from AssetMark to Wealthbox CRM  
**Data Synced:** Account balances, holdings, demographics  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (native Wealthbox integration)  
**Limitations:** Requires Wealthbox subscription  
**Documentation:** Available through Wealthbox

#### 6. Open API Integration
**Type:** REST API  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Custom integrations with proprietary systems  
**Data Synced:** Full data access based on API permissions  
**Setup Complexity:** Hard (requires development resources)  
**Limitations:** Enterprise tier required  
**Documentation:** Available through AssetMark

#### 7. Custodian Platform Integrations
**Type:** Native integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data access from custodians)  
**What it does:** Integrates with major custodians for account data  
**Data Synced:** Account positions, transaction history, account details  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (standard custodian integration)  
**Limitations:** Requires custodian relationships  
**Documentation:** Available through custodians

#### 8. Third-Party Technology Integrations
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export)  
**What it does:** Connects with vetted third-party technology platforms  
**Data Synced:** Portfolio data, client information, account details  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires third-party subscription)  
**Limitations:** Separate platform required  
**Documentation:** Available through integration partners

---

## Integration Types Available

- **Native integrations:** Redtail CRM, eWealthManager portal
- **API:** Open API for custom integrations
- **Third-party:** Voyant, MoneyGuide, Wealthbox, various platforms
- **Custodian:** Major custodian platforms

- **CRM Systems:** Redtail CRM, Wealthbox
- **Financial Planning:** Voyant, MoneyGuide
- **Custodian Platforms:** Major custodians (Schwab, Fidelity, etc.)
- **Portfolio Management:** eWealthManager, direct indexing tools
- **Practice Management:** Integrated business tools

## API & Developer Info

**API Availability:** Yes (Enterprise tier)

**Developer Portal:** Available through AssetMark sales and support

**Authentication Methods:**
- API keys for custom integrations
- OAuth 2.0 for third-party apps
- SSO (SAML) for platform access

**Rate Limits:** Not publicly disclosed (contact for enterprise limits)

**API Documentation:** Available through enterprise sales

**Webhook Support:** Yes for real-time notifications

**API Cost:** Included in enterprise pricing (no separate API fees)

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **Comprehensive Platform** - End-to-end wealth management solution
2. **Open Architecture** - Flexible investment selection across multiple asset classes
3. **Turnkey Solution** - TAMP with practice management support
4. **Direct Indexing** - Tax-efficient direct indexing with TMS included
5. **Integrated Technology** - eWealthManager portal and CRM integrations
6. **Professional Management** - Model portfolios and professional investment management
7. **Practice Management Support** - Business development and operational consulting
8. **Competitive Pricing** - Transparent fee structure with volume discounts

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **Platform Fee** - $350 annual minimum (waived on some accounts)
2. **Account-Based Pricing** - Costs scale with assets under management
3. **Complex Fee Structure** - Multiple fee tiers and advisory rates
4. **AssetMark Ecosystem** - Best integration within their platform
5. **Not a Standalone CRM** - Requires integration with CRM for full functionality
6. **Transaction Fees** - $20 per trade for certain transactions

### Alternatives
- **Envestnet:** Comprehensive TAMP and wealth management platform
- **Orion Advisor Solutions:** Portfolio management and reporting
- **Schwab Advisor Services:** Custodial and wealth management platform
- **Fidelity Institutional:** Custodial and advisory services
- **Pershing/WAFX:** Wealth management platform

### Use Cases

**Ideal For:**
- Advisors seeking a turnkey asset management solution
- Practices wanting integrated technology and investment management
- Firms looking for practice management support
- Advisors needing direct indexing capabilities
- Practices wanting open-architecture investment options
- Firms seeking comprehensive client reporting and analytics

**Not Ideal For:**
- Advisors wanting standalone CRM (requires integration)
- Practices not needing investment management services
- Firms with existing investment management infrastructure
- Advisors seeking purely technology platform (TAMP included)
- Very small practices (platform fee may be high)

### Key Differentiators

1. **Turnkey Asset Management Program (TAMP)** - Comprehensive investment management with technology
2. **Open Architecture** - Flexible investment selection across multiple asset classes
3. **Practice Management Support** - Business consulting and growth support included
4. **Direct Indexing with TMS** - Tax-managed direct indexing starting at 0.50%
5. **Integrated Technology Stack** - eWealthManager portal with CRM integrations
6. **Comprehensive Fee Structure** - Transparent pricing with volume breakpoints
